document_data.name: Dreveth
document_data.Abilities: As a highly experienced [[wizard]] who specialised in [[divination]] [[magic]], Dreveth could cast some of very powerful divination [[spell]]s, if needed.
document_data.Activities: Dreveth the Gray was occasionally known to lend help to [[adventurer]]s in need of his aid. However this help was generally only given out to those he deemed to be serving the cause of good.
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], Dreveth the Gray resided in [[Hillsfar]] where he would aid adventurers that he considered to be undertaking goodly deeds.
